name: Bomb Repulsion
description:
You are humanity's last resort to defend the planet from the invasion of Bombs! Your Ship is equipped with two magnetic Beams:

The Pull Beam and The Push Beam!

By using them and the Power-Ups you catch, you will have to deflect the waves of enemies coming towards you that will try to destroy the Shield around your planet.

But remember: you cannot leave the atmosphere of your planet!

Controls (Xbox 360 Controller - Windows):

Left Stick - Movement

Right Stick - Beam Rotation

LB (Left Shoulder) - Pull Beam

RB (Right Shoulder) - Push Beam

You can change them in the launcher in the Input Tab!

Controls (PS3 Controller - Mac):

Left Stick - Movement

Right Stick - Beam Rotation

L1/L2 (Left Triggers) - Pull Beam

R1/R2 (Right Triggers) - Push Beam

You can change them in the launcher in the Input Tab!

This game was made in three weeks for the second stage of Rising Star 2017!
